data.title: David J. Fisher
meta_keywords: DC law firm. Paris law firm
data.meta_description: Kramer Levin provides proactive, creative and pragmatic solutions that address todayâs most challenging legal issues. The firm is headquartered in New York with offices in Silicon Valley, Washington, DC, and Paris and fosters a strong culture of involvement in public and community service.
data.text:
David represents companies and individuals as borrowers and issuers, as well as commercial banks, funds and other nonbank entities as lenders, in a variety of domestic and international financing transactions. His practice also focuses on a wide variety of debt restructurings, representing lending institutions, distressed companies, creditorsâ committees and private equity funds.

David has extensive experience with syndicated financing transactions and private placements, including asset-based financing, first and second lien debt transactions, debtor-in-possession financings, high-yield debt issuances, acquisition finance, leveraged buyouts, loan assignments and participations, and project finance, and has served as counsel to companies in a variety of industries, among them manufacturing, telecommunications, energy, paper producers and consumer goods.
